markdown:
{{NPC infobox |game = poe2 |name = Rinco |image = Portrait_Rinco_Convo.png |image2 = PE2 Rinco.png |caption = |race = Human |subrace = Ocean |gender = Male |culture = [The Vailian Republics](/theVailianRepublics/) |background = |faction = |deity = |personality = |class = |level = 2 |MIG = 11 |CON = 12 |DEX = 16 |PER = 11 |INT = 13 |RES = 14 |health = 2 |damage = 5-8 {{crush}} / 5-8 {{crush}} |accuracy = 4 / 4 |penetration = 7 / 7 |deflection = 7 |fortitude = 9 |reflex = 17 |will = 17 |dr = 3 |ability = [Fighting Spirit](/fightingSpiritDeadfire/) |location = [Rinco's Home](/rincosHome/) |quests = [Burning Bridges](/burningBridges/) |sells = |resting = |adventurers = |companion = |loot = |body = Vailian Frock Coat |internalname = NPC_PM_Rinco |guid = d10bde27-e4a6-4686-a91c-11a2ffc74ad9 }} '''Rinco''' is a character in {{poe2}}. ## Background {{Description|The figure in the bed is a young Vailian man. The first thing you notice is that he seems to have been severely beaten. One eye is nearly swollen shut, and where his skin is revealed it is a patchwork of livid bruises. He groans and winces as he props himself up, glaring up at you with one good eye.}} Rinco had the misfortune of coming across [Mokeha](/mokeha/), a local Mataru, who took a liking to the money in his pocket. His night of good luck ended as she pummeled him senselessly, then made off with his pouch. [Torri](/torri/), Rinco's son, is keeping him company while he recovers. Rinco's wife, Zaneta, is a researcher at the Engwithan Dig Site. ## Interactions {{Interactions |companion = |wares = |stronghold = |rest = |quests_started = [Burning Bridges](/burningBridges/) |quests_involved = |none = |other = * A [godlike](/godlike/) or [island aumaua](/islandAumaua/) Watcher has unique introductory dialogue with Rinco. }} ## =Quests = * [Burning Bridges](/burningBridges/): Rinco asks you to recover his money. ## Companion reactivity When first talking to Rinco by his bedside: * '''[Aloth](/aloth/):''' ''"Reminds me of a time Iselmyr got mouthy with a Rauataian mercenary." He leans close, murmuring to you.'' * '''[Edér](/eder/):''' ''"I know exactly how he feels. I've beat up a lot of folks just the same way."'' {{topic|Lighthearted}} * '''[Xoti](/xoti/):''' ''"You look like you already got a foot in the grave." She thumbs the cage of her lantern thoughtfully.'' {{topic|Dutiful}} (Only if [The Lantern of Gaun](/theLanternOfGaun/) has not yet been completed) {{hr}} After asking what happened to him:
  • '''[Serafen](/serafen/):''' ''"Everyone tells tales of the kraken and the ravagers, but I've long said the aumaua be the true natural danger of the Deadfire."''
  • '''Serafen:''' ''He winks at Maia.'' {{topic|Lighthearted}} (If Maia is in the party)
  • '''Serafen:''' ''"Meaning no offense to yourself, cap." He grins.'' (If the Watcher is an [island aumaua](/islandAumaua/))
[Category:Port Maje characters](/categoryPortMajeCharacters/) [Category:Port Maje Harbor characters](/categoryPortMajeHarborCharacters/)

{{NPC infobox |game = poe2 |name = Rinco |image = Portrait_Rinco_Convo.png |image2 = PE2 Rinco.png |caption = |race = Human |subrace = Ocean |gender = Male |culture = [[The Vailian Republics]] |background = |faction = |deity = |personality = |class = |level = 2 |MIG = 11 |CON = 12 |DEX = 16 |PER = 11 |INT = 13 |RES = 14 |health = 2 |damage = 5-8 {{crush}} / 5-8 {{crush}} |accuracy = 4 / 4 |penetration = 7 / 7 |deflection = 7 |fortitude = 9 |reflex = 17 |will = 17 |dr = 3 |ability = [[Fighting Spirit (Deadfire)|Fighting Spirit]] |location = [[Rinco's Home]] |quests = [[Burning Bridges]] |sells = |resting = |adventurers = |companion = |loot = |body = Vailian Frock Coat |internalname = NPC_PM_Rinco |guid = d10bde27-e4a6-4686-a91c-11a2ffc74ad9 }} '''Rinco''' is a character in {{poe2}}. ==Background== {{Description|The figure in the bed is a young Vailian man. The first thing you notice is that he seems to have been severely beaten. One eye is nearly swollen shut, and where his skin is revealed it is a patchwork of livid bruises. He groans and winces as he props himself up, glaring up at you with one good eye.}} Rinco had the misfortune of coming across [[Mokeha]], a local Mataru, who took a liking to the money in his pocket. His night of good luck ended as she pummeled him senselessly, then made off with his pouch. [[Torri]], Rinco's son, is keeping him company while he recovers. Rinco's wife, Zaneta, is a researcher at the Engwithan Dig Site. ==Interactions== {{Interactions |companion = |wares = |stronghold = |rest = |quests_started = [[Burning Bridges]] |quests_involved = |none = |other = * A [[godlike]] or [[island aumaua]] Watcher has unique introductory dialogue with Rinco. }} ===Quests=== * [[Burning Bridges]]: Rinco asks you to recover his money. ==Companion reactivity== When first talking to Rinco by his bedside: * '''[[Aloth]]:''' ''"Reminds me of a time Iselmyr got mouthy with a Rauataian mercenary." He leans close, murmuring to you.'' * '''[[Edér]]:''' ''"I know exactly how he feels. I've beat up a lot of folks just the same way."'' {{topic|Lighthearted}} * '''[[Xoti]]:''' ''"You look like you already got a foot in the grave." She thumbs the cage of her lantern thoughtfully.'' {{topic|Dutiful}} (Only if [[The Lantern of Gaun]] has not yet been completed) {{hr}} After asking what happened to him:
  • '''[[Serafen]]:''' ''"Everyone tells tales of the kraken and the ravagers, but I've long said the aumaua be the true natural danger of the Deadfire."''
  • '''Serafen:''' ''He winks at Maia.'' {{topic|Lighthearted}} (If Maia is in the party)
  • '''Serafen:''' ''"Meaning no offense to yourself, cap." He grins.'' (If the Watcher is an [[island aumaua]])

title: Rinco
